review: A captivating read with well-developed characters and a compelling plot. I couldn't put it down!
Interesting concept, but the execution fell a bit short for me. Still, worth a read.
Absolutely loved this book! The writing is beautiful, and the story is thought-provoking.
Not my cup of tea. The characters felt one-dimensional, and the pacing was uneven.
Solid storytelling and engaging characters. Enjoyed it from beginning to end.
Mixed feelings about this one. Some parts were great, but others left me wanting more.
